title: Allow us to see in game if people are queueing together
body: It would be great if we could see in champ select if people are queued together. It would solve so many problems, especially in blind pick when they gank up on a player to give them the role they want.

replies.body:
It's unnecessary information. If they ever did do this, it would only promote toxicity, or have no effect on the game at all. 

I'm not sure if you know, but you used to be able to see everyone's ping in the loading screen. They removed this for the reason above. There's no need for anyone but yourself to know that information.

Sometimes I'd prefer if everyone else knew that I had 6k ping all of a sudden with no prior hint as to when it happens. In the loading screen, fine, but it should be seen ingame too :(

As for knowing about premades, there should be a reminder that chat is the same for all players and a chat log is recorded for reporting purposes.
They should put like a red dot or something next to people queueing together and a different colour for another team
